select ahp.ID_ as id, ahp.START_TIME_ as startTime, ahp.END_TIME_ as endTime, ahp.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ as actInstanceId, ahp.START_USER_ID_ as startUserId, pd.name as processName, pd.id as processDefId, pi.title as title, pi.id as instanceId from ACT_HI_PROCINST ahp left join PROCESSDEF pd on ahp.PROC_DEF_ID_=pd.actDefId left join PROCESSDEFINSTANCE pi on ahp.PROC_INST_ID_=pi.actInstanceId where ahp.START_USER_ID_=#{userId} and pi.title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title}), '%') and pd.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{processName}), '%') and ahp.START_TIME_ > #{startTime} and ahp.START_TIME_ < #{endTime}
and ahp.END_TIME_ is null
and ahp.END_TIME_ is not null
order by ahp.START_TIME_ desc

select count(*) from ACT_HI_PROCINST ahp left join PROCESSDEF pd on ahp.PROC_DEF_ID_=pd.actDefId left join PROCESSDEFINSTANCE pi on ahp.PROC_INST_ID_=pi.actInstanceId where ahp.START_USER_ID_=#{userId} and pi.title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{title}), '%') and pd.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{processName}), '%') and ahp.START_TIME_ > #{startTime} and ahp.START_TIME_ < #{endTime}
and ahp.END_TIME_ is null
and ahp.END_TIME_ is not null
order by ahp.START_TIME_ desc
